Hello everyone.
Is it possible to customize the message appearing after a user submits the HS membership form for password reset? We're talking about the form on the system template "membership-reset-password-request", so no thank you message edit option here from the editor like for custom forms, isn't it?
Is there a way provided by HS natively or should I resort to use some Javascript trick? (as long as it is doable)
